original_title: Dem abruptly leaves press call after being informed she is committing felony | Fox News
article_summary: Texas Rep. Nicole Collier abruptly leaves call with California Gov. Gavin Newsom and DNC Chair after being told participating from a state Capitol bathroom during a legislative session could be a felony. The call was about a redistricting bill in Texas, which Collier claimed violates the Voting Rights Act.</s>
